name: operation, dried roughage store, cold-air dried, conventional | operation, dried roughage store, cold-air dried, conventional | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11091/documentation

The functional unit is 1 kg of dry matter hay.This module should be used when evaluating storage of hay at farm, in a ventilated storey barn. Dataset based on GLO parent dataset. The only differences with the parent dataset are (1) the production volume, which now represents the production volume in Quebec; (2) Data Quality Pedigree indicators which was modified to account for the fact that GLO data is used to represent Quebec activities; (3) the geographical location and (4) energy demand which has been adapted acordingly to Quebec specificity.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

This activity starts with dried hay at farm barn storey. 

This activity ends with dried hay at farm barn storey. 
The dataset includes the energy demand (supplied by consumption of electricity) for ventilating the storey. Also included in the inventory is the infrastructure (building).
The dataset does not include waste and direct emissions (like dust).
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0163:Post-harvest crop activities

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Period indicated in the reference for parent data.;;;Electricity consumption is based on a 2010 report from the CRAAQ and might be representative of more recent time.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The inventories are based on Quebec technical data (for energy consumption) and indications made by drying plants in Switzerland (for parent data).
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Storage of hay at farm in a ventilated storey barn, at ambiant temperature. Roughage is usually conditionned in smales bales. Fan motor power is 5 HP. During storage, roughage moisture content is usually lowered from 20% to 11% moisture content. ;References : ;BEAUREGARD, G. (2013). Production budget of agricultural productions in Quebec. Technical report for CIRAIG.;CRAAQ (2010). Séchage des grains - Données techniques. AGDEX 736, juin 2010, 6p. [Centre de Référence en Agriculture et Agroalimentaire du Québec]
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
Dataset based on GLO parent dataset..
Infrastructure data are kept from parent dataset and may not be representative of the geography and the technology. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
